item.title: Blazor Radzen Loading on Page
item.description: Blazor Radzen Loading on Page Blazor: Blazor is a web framework that allows developers to build interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript. It enables full-stack development with .NET. Radzen: Radzen is a set of UI components for Blazor that provides ready-to-use components for building responsive and user-friendly web applications. Loading Indicator: A loading indicator is a visual element that indicates the progress of an ongoing operation, such as data loading or processing.
